I’m trying to consolidate the many different posts about this into one place :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi, as there is no dedicated channel wrt video, I’ll post my question here. Did anyone ran a comparison of video hosting platforms that have an integration with HubSpot? The marketplace lists 5 platforms (Vidyard, Wistia, BrightCove, Cincopa and SproutVideo). I’m interested in understanding the _depth_ of the integration (iaw what options are enabled).
